name: Fresenius Medical Care AG & Co. KGaA
description: Fresenius Medical Care AG & Co. KGaA is the world's leading provider of products and services for individuals undergoing dialysis due to chronic kidney failure. Founded in 1996 and headquartered in Bad Homburg, Germany, the company operates a global network of dialysis clinics and manufactures a comprehensive range of dialysis equipment and supplies. Fresenius Medical Care aims to provide high-quality care and innovative solutions to improve the lives of patients with kidney disease. The company serves over 345,000 patients in more than 4,000 clinics across North America, Europe, Asia, and other regions. Its commitment to research and development enables the company to continuously enhance its treatment options, including hemodialysis and peritoneal dialysis, as well as advanced technologies such as dialysis machines, filtration systems, and medical devices. In addition to its clinical operations, Fresenius Medical Care is dedicated to fostering partnerships with healthcare providers, payers, and patients to ensure optimal care delivery and patient outcomes. With a strong focus on sustainability and corporate responsibility, the company actively engages in initiatives that promote environmental stewardship and social engagement within the communities it serves.
